description: Sagara Hyouma was originally http://anidb.net/ch88741 [Assassin of Black]`s Master, but was killed by her right after the summoning ritual and before he transferred his Command Spells to her new master, http://anidb.net/ch89999 [Rikudou Reika], who was supposed to be a sacrifice used in the ritual.
name: Sagara Hyouma
